languages.text: "По поводу суда с моим участием... Что за история с трибуналом Инквизитора, Хейнриксом и Теодорой? Зачем?!"
"The tribunal — what was that about? I was being tried by the Inquisitor, and Heinrix and Theodora were there. Why?"
languages.original_text: "По поводу суда с моим участием... Что за история с трибуналом Инквизитора, Хейнриксом и Теодорой? Зачем?!"

traits.locale_text: "The tribunal — what was that about? I was being tried by the Inquisitor, and Heinrix and Theodora were there. Why?"
"The tribunal — what was that about? I was being tried by the Inquisitor, and Heinrix and Theodora were there. Why?"
"The tribunal — what was that about? I was being tried by the Inquisitor, and Heinrix and Theodora were there. Why?"
"The tribunal — what was that about? I was being tried by the Inquisitor, and Heinrix and Theodora were there. Why?"

languages.text: «El tribunal... ¿De qué iba todo eso? Me estaban juzgando el Inquisidor, y Heinrix y Theodora estaban presentes. ¿Por qué?».
languages.original_text: "The tribunal — what was that about? I was being tried by the Inquisitor, and Heinrix and Theodora were there. Why?"

traits.locale_text: «El tribunal... ¿De qué iba todo eso? Me estaban juzgando el Inquisidor, y Heinrix y Theodora estaban presentes. ¿Por qué?».

languages.text: “那场裁决到底是怎么回事？我遭到了审判官的审判，海因里希和西奥多拉也在场，这到底是怎么回事？”
languages.original_text: "The tribunal — what was that about? I was being tried by the Inquisitor, and Heinrix and Theodora were there. Why?"

traits.locale_text: “那场裁决到底是怎么回事？我遭到了审判官的审判，海因里希和西奥多拉也在场，这到底是怎么回事？”

languages.text: 「法廷…あれは、なんだったんだ？{mf|俺|私}は異端審問官に裁かれ、ハインリックスとシオドーラもそこにいた。なぜだ？」
languages.original_text: "The tribunal — what was that about? I was being tried by the Inquisitor, and Heinrix and Theodora were there. Why?"

traits.locale_text: 「法廷…あれは、なんだったんだ？{mf|俺|私}は異端審問官に裁かれ、ハインリックスとシオドーラもそこにいた。なぜだ？」

languages.text: « Qu'est-ce que c'était que ce simulacre de procès ? L'inquisiteur m'a {mf|mis|mise} sur la sellette, en présence d'Heinrix et Théodora, qui plus est. Pourquoi cela ? »
languages.original_text: "The tribunal — what was that about? I was being tried by the Inquisitor, and Heinrix and Theodora were there. Why?"

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est-ce que c'était que ce simulacre de procès ? L'inquisiteur m'a {mf|mis|mise} sur la sellette, en présence d'Heinrix et Théodora, qui plus est. Pourquoi cela ? »

languages.text: "Das Tribunal, was sollte das? Der Inquisitor hat über mich geurteilt, und Heinrix und Theodora waren dort. Warum?"
languages.original_text: "The tribunal — what was that about? I was being tried by the Inquisitor, and Heinrix and Theodora were there. Why?"

traits.locale_text: "Das Tribunal, was sollte das? Der Inquisitor hat über mich geurteilt, und Heinrix und Theodora waren dort. Warum?"

languages.text: "Mahkeme ne içindi? Engizisyoncu beni yargıladı. Heinrix'le Theodora da vardı. Neden?"
languages.original_text: "The tribunal — what was that about? I was being tried by the Inquisitor, and Heinrix and Theodora were there. Why?"

traits.locale_text: "Mahkeme ne içindi? Engizisyoncu beni yargıladı. Heinrix'le Theodora'da vardı. Neden?"
